column5: I am doing some boat mods and have several pcs of bare aluminum that I am goint to need painting. All the info I get off the internet have a five stage chemical process to paint it....My question is..  Does anyone have any experience with painting aluminum???....Maybe a paint product that they know of that can eliminate this process.  I have had aluminum anodized for work in the recent past but it's $$$$ and would like to avoid it if possible.   Thanks
i believe there was a thread about painting aluminum recently.  if its bare go with a self etching primer, then primer then paint.
Here's a link from here do a search on here theres a ton of info  http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.p...nting+aluminium
